title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Visitor Center
body: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Visitor Center        NPS Collection       Facility Hours   Open Everyday. 8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. (Memorial Day weekend - Labor Day weekend). 8:30 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. (Winter months). Closed for Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Day holidays.  Street Address 1215 North State Road 49 Porter, IN 46304 (219) 395-1882 GPS Coordinates 41.633793, -87.054220 (Decimal Degrees)       Visitor Activities   100-vehicle parking lot including bus & RV parking spaces. Displays showing information about Porter County, the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore and the Indiana Dunes State Park. View artist exhibits. Enjoy the Activity Room. Watch the short orientation video "Child of the Northwest Wind". Shop in the Eastern National bookstore. Pick up brochures about Porter County, the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore and Indiana Dunes State Park.  The Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore and Indiana Dunes Tourism share this visitor center.
